entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the boy in the photograph with Scabbers on his shoulder. He is also referred to by name when Lupin asks Black how he got the photograph.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is Ron's pet rat and is mentioned as being on Ron's shoulder in the photograph.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is a wizard who has been imprisoned in Azkaban and is referred to by name when Lupin asks him how he got the photograph.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a wizard who is present with Black and Ron and is referred to by name when he asks Black how he got the photograph.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as the person who gave Black the paper with the photograph on it.

relationships.description: Black has a photo of Ron and his family, which he obtained from Fudge.
Lupin recognizes Scabbers as Peter Pettigrew in his transformed state.
Black received the photo from Fudge when he came to inspect Azkaban.
